item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Welcome

What’s new

As part of updating the Emacs-SF github organization’s meetup-notes repository:

  • I’ve enabled the Discussions tab there, and the Wiki pages are now publicly editable.
  • I’ve also created the Emacs-SF.github.io repository for publishing this blog.
  • I’ve created the ox-hugo-blog-content repository for the actual org files that the blog posts are generated from.

In progress

  • customizing the site; adding a sidebar with categories/tags
  • adding meta content
  • linking to meeting notes
